Burberry made the right move with the launch of Body, but they need to keep the same momentum by making entirely new launches all the time. They have such potential, but always lose it by investing in such flankers. I'm so disappointed.

A faint vetiver and marigold which I don’t fancy opened the scent up. Then an even fainter tea note appeared before the entire scent disappeared from my skin completely. Then an even scent didn’t last ten minutes on my skin but remained faintly woody on clothing after twenty four hours. The vetiver was nice as a note but anything beyond marigold was just gone before any feeling could be felt. This coming from two sprays which is the norm I set for testing was just pathetic. A real shame coming from a luxury line from the house that created my favorite amber scent.

Body EDP, Intense, Gold.... all of them are hidden gems. Body Rose Gold is woody, powdery, rosy, soft, fruity, peachy, very autumnal perfume. It lasts a very long time but its texture is soft. Reminds me of quiet autumn evenings, falling leaves and rays of sunshine.

this perfume remind's me of the ellen tracy perfume i'm wearing today the only difference is this is a fuzzy peach like you would feel in a lolita lempicka or hypnotic poison where as that one is more juicy dense and sweet..really they both have the same peach rose heart...actually think that the ellen tracy one is better and less expensive for the price but this was a collectors edition of the fragrance so i like the bottle and the scent..i have both but if i had to buy this fragrance over i would go with the ellen tracy..if you haven't tried the ellen tracy..go try a bottle they are fairly cheap and of better quality..it was one of ellen tracy's finer fragrances...this one is too..also mix this scent with a coconut pina colada fragrance like gold sugar or some other same type fragrance and watch the magic happen..something my daughter helped me to discover one day..enjoy!

A possible fragrance wear for the 1st January 2019. A very long lasting and elegantly beautiful fragrance. I think it is dicontinued. I just enjoy wearing it!

Happy new year everyone! I wish the best for you and your loved ones x
Mzurilove
I thought, what does Body Rose Gold (and Body too) remind me of, and finally I understood - Tresor Lancome. They are close relatives.

Lovely cuddly warm perfume, it is the best on me during Fall. I love the whole Body line of Burberry, this one is really similar to the original edp, probably this one is not even a flanker but only a limited package. Either way I adore it and fall in love with it each Fall and wearing only this one during the rainy chilly days just like warm and elegant cashmere scarf.

Supposedly it's limited edition. I had this version. Mainly fet the pleasant smell of cashmere tree, slightly roses and sideburns, in the background, vanilla.
In the winter season quite good FITS - soft, gives the effect of a wearing a cozy sweater. However, the life expectancy is average - after 3 hours my skin almost fades and is weakly noticeable. Beacuse of that this could be called edt.

Over the yars, Burberry has spoiled us with so much unique, beautiful and high quality scents..This one is pretty unique and pleasant, but unfortunately not very longlasting on me. What I love is the blend of woody notes and rose, creating a prefect balance between flowery-woody, mature-young, sparkling-heavy scent, making it perfect for all day times, times of the year and occasions. It's disadvantage is the poor aura and having to spill half of the bottle on myself if i want it to stay all day.

A classy,clean musky rose with powdery woody undertones and sweet peachy creamy smell like ladies dewy skin, I love this and think it's perfect!
Sophisticated and womanly it lasts really well.

It's classy sexy, you know like a cashmere jumper with jeans, but jeans with a rip in showing just enough leg, I wear this when I want to give of 'the vibe' in a subtle way, if you know what I mean!

Very nice perfume for a daily or evening use, it is not unique, but it's classy and sophisticated. Rose seem to dominate over the rest of ingredients, but thankfully not too much. It is also long lasting. I think that it is very similar to the first Body, but I can not be sure because I've only tested it(Body edp). Finally, it's really well balanced fragrance, suitable for almost any occasion.
had the limited edition. on paper should be lovely, just my kind of profile however really did not work for me. the bottle was interesting though

The best in the Series of Body. Very fresh and elegant, dewey Roses in a great mix of Cashmerewood and Iris. Love!

Den bästa i body-serien. Otroligt fräsch, elegant. Daggfräscha rosor i god mix av Cashmereträ och Iris. Kärlek!

Sexy, clean, smells like money smells like my bank account is full of many figures hahaha. Luxurious..bottle is supersonic and great :) lasts long, affordable and generous scent. I likey :)

My very first Burberry scent, high hopes for the rest now... It is creamy and very tricky to describe ... I stayed in St, Tropez once... If I went there again I would wear this on the yacht and drink a ......ribena hahahahahah No more Champagne for me..

I would suggest getting the accompaniments, the body milk , the mist very generous amounts and long lasting. Sophistication in a bottle. Difficult to dislike.

Elegance and sophistication in a bottle! In my opinion, this is not an everyday perfume but something to set aside for special occasions. The lasting power is amazing on my skin. I could still smell it on my wrists after showering. I am not usually a fan of Burberry fragrances but this one is amazing.

I have smelled the original and this version is almost if not the same scent. I can't detect any difference. This rosy scent is quite sophisticated and feminine because it's not sugary sweet but it's slightly sweet, woody scent that can appeal to different age groups. It's along the style of YSL Paris with a twist. The originaL BB is a silage monster bordering on annoying if oversprayed. This one I've worn but a few times but silage and longevity were not an issue. I could smell it on myself for many hours. Nobody complimented or complained about the scent. The name of the perfume and the color go hand in hand. For some reason I think of copper when I smell this definitely a good scent worth trying but don't expect something unique or different. This perfume might be a good option to wear with your rose gold watch or jewelry.

This perfume is really true to its name since you can really smell the rose petals.
Besides that it also has a woody scent.

It's quite heavy and you can still smell the rosiness after 6 hours.
I really like this perfume and I have the 60ml bottle, it lasts really long so it's really worth the money.

Love this version more than the original!

I tested this today. Shock horror, if you like Heidi Klums Surprise perfume to me they are slightly similar. As soon as I sprayed the Burberry it reminded me of Heidi's perfume. They are slightly different but I think the same style of perfume. The Burberry perfume has more complexity and not quite as one dimensional as Heidi's tends to dry to a powdery musk. If you used Heidi's perfume but wanted something more refined and more complex or can't get Heidi's Surprise then try the Burberry Body Rose Gold.

A sophisticated woody, musky scent with subtle rose nuances. Very feminine, comforting and clean. Dries down to something soft and powdery. Very true to its name, smells like a warm hug on a wintery day. The bottle is pretty but not at all practical.

I got it for my mom as a present for her
name day and I've noticed that whenever
I visit her from then on, I never forget to
spritz myself with it before I leave!! Truly
optimistic notes that transmit the happiness
of life!! It's definitely more long lasting than
the original and kind of "deeper"..

i took a chance on this scent and couldn't pass it up for the price i got it at...i love it it's a warm,fuzzy,feminine,soft,sweet rose because of the peach in it...it is really nice and the bottle looks gorgeous i am happy to get the limited edition...also this one last's a long time..the sillage is a bit above average and its not loud..very nice comfortable spring, summer, business daytime scent..
I was not a fan of body until i got this one. I Like this rosy, light and lasting summer frag.

I must be honest, there are very little differences between this fragrance and the original Burberry Body EDP. In fact, I suspect they are the same fragrance. A few people have been misinformed, and believe that this is a new flanker, rather than a re-packaged version of the original.

This special edition hasn't reached the department stores in my area yet, however I managed to find it in a Burberry boutique near the scarf section. I applied a few sprays to my wrists, and continued shopping. By the time I got home, I could still smell it, nearly five hours later.

To quote my review on Burberry Body EDP, "you may be initially turned off by Burberry Body Rose Gold's opening, which to my nose was a little chemical, like the scent of insect repellent or hairspray. I was admittedly annoyed by these top notes, and had grave fears for what would follow.

Thankfully Burberry Body improves throughout its development. It's not an extremely loud fragrance, yet it does have good projection. Cashmere wood and sandalwood are the most dominant accords to my nose, followed by musk and creamy vanilla. The rose is very subtle, tending to be more sweet and fresh rather than tart-like".

I detected more peach and rose in the composition while wearing Burberry Body Rose Gold, and I suspect that the warm, sunny weather may have had something to do with that. The only unfortunate thing about Burberry Body Rose Gold is its rather expensive price tag. The salesperson in the Burberry boutique quoted this fragrance as $180 AUD for the 85ml bottle.

I really like this. It is a warm rosy iris mix in the beginning. The dry down is very different, it is like the peach and freesia decide they want to be the stars. I will admit that it is rather synthetic at first. I sprayed and walked away with no problem. About 30 minutes later I needed to have it. It has long lasting power, medium projection and is a scent that works for any age. I am not a big Burberry fan but this one just captured me, surprise, surprise.
این تفاوت دا باربری وجود دارد که توانسته یک انقلاب در شیشه ودگرگونی رایحه ایجاد کند وخواص بودن همانند یک محصول مشابه دیور میس شری را با توانی خیلی کمتر برای خانمهای علاقمند باین محصول جلب کندو؟؟؟
